p: In the DOT-group 58 patients received their antiviral therapy together with OST on a once-daily basis, 14 on a once-weekly basis, one on a twice weekly and one on a thrice-weekly basis. Adherence to therapy was excellent: 70 of 74 patients (94.6%) did not miss a single scheduled date for ingestion of antiviral therapy together with OST; four patients missed 19, 7, 4 and 2 dates, respectively. Three of these four patients achieved SVR12; the patient who had missed 7 dates was lost to FU. Overall, only 32 out of 3,332 (0.96%) scheduled dates were missed by the patients. No patient discontinued treatment because of adverse events or lack of compliance.
